## The Vision {background-image="images/msai_title_neon_1769666977973.png" background-opacity="0.2"}

- **George Mason University**
- Launched **Fall 2025**
- Addressing the critical **AI Skills Gap**
- **Engineering AI Operations**: Build, Scale, and Govern
- **Cross-College Synergy**: CS, Systems, Statistics, Policy, and Business


## The Workforce Readiness Gap {background-image="images/msai_gap_neon_1769666993144.png" background-opacity="0.2"}


- **89%** of organizations are investing in AI.
- Only **6%** of employees feel comfortable using it.
- **51%** of tech leaders report an AI skills shortage (Double from 18 months ago).

> "95% of AI projects fail to generate a return on ROI. It's not a lack of AI capability, but weak implementation and integration." — MIT Project NANDA, 2025
